content:
# I have successfully collected 10 Stone along with the 10 Iron Ore I gathered earlier. 
# Now I can craft the Stone Furnace.

# First, I need to ensure that I have enough materials to craft the Stone Furnace.
ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # This will check if I can craft the Stone Furnace.
stone_furnace = craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft the Stone Furnace.
